segments.text: I was meaning to ask you if you saw the basketball game on Friday .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I wanted to go , but I couldn't .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It's too bad that I couldn't make it . Who won ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Our team played hard and won .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I really wish I went to the game .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It was the best game ever .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: So tell me the final score .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: The other team lost by three points , 101-98 .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It must've been a close game .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It really was . You should've gone .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Hopefully , I'll make it to the next one .
segments.speaker: S2
